name: Edessa: School of Wizardry
description:
Edessa: School of Wizardry is a dark themed action game set in a magical universe. Fight the demons that have plagued the world and cast your spells with the Edessa's unique spellcasting mechanic. Fight the bosses, solve the puzzles and come out on top.

KEY FEATURES



In this world, it takes more than just pushing a button to cast a spell. To perform your desired spell, you need to draw the required symbols.


Find your way through the house by solving the puzzles.


Explore the Gobeklitepe. The oldest temple in the world.
